InstructionData.Title: Plant Grower
InstructionData.Author: onebit
InstructionData.Instructions:
alias DaySensor d0 alias Light d1 alias TempSensor d2 alias Cooler d3 alias Heater d4
alias daytime r0 alias temperature r1 alias cooldown r2 alias heatup r3 alias coolsp r4 alias heatsp r5
define MINTEMP 22.3333 #74F define MAXTEMP 24.3333 #74F add coolsp MAXTEMP 273.15 add heatsp MINTEMP 273.15
loop: l daytime DaySensor Activate sb -1758710260 On daytime
l temperature TempSensor Temperature sgt cooldown temperature coolsp s Cooler On cooldown slt heatup temperature heatsp s Heater On heatup
yield j loop
